directions: Combine mangoes, avocados, onion, and habanero pepper in a bowl and toss. Add cilantro and drizzle with lime juice. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 3  champagne mangos, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 medium red onion, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Easy Mango-Avocado Salsa
